name: Interrobang
description:
It's a platformer with only one button. Everything runs according to a clock, including your movement. Also it contains some personal opinions on a specific punctuation mark.

This is my first time entering any kind of game jam, and also my first time finishing and releasing anything that could be recognised as a game. I had a lot of fun putting this together, though I don't know how much I can speak for it's quality. At time of writing I've been awake for 22 hours; my opinions cannot be trusted. 

Also, this game was gonna have some music to go with the obnoxious metronome, but the only composer I know wasn't available at the time. So just imagine a bomb-ass sound track to go along with this janky little game.

If you have fun with it, well, I've not really got anything else for you to play, but what I do have is a dumb twitter bot. Follow @bot_crossover on Twitter for a half-hourly reminder of the wasted potential in Disney's hoard of intellectual property.
